00028 #ifndef _QicsDataModelDefault_H
00029 #define _QicsDataModelDefault_H
00030 
00031 #include <QicsDataModel.h>
00032 #include <QicsDataItem.h>
00033 #include <qstring.h>
00034 #include <qvaluevector.h>
00035 
00036 typedef QValueVector<QicsDataItem *> QicsDataItemPV;
00037 typedef QValueVector<QicsDataItemPV *> QicsDataItemPVPV;
00038 
00039 
00074 class QicsDataModelDefault: public QicsDataModel {
00075     Q_OBJECT
00076 public:
00077     QicsDataModelDefault(int num_rows = 0, int num_cols = 0);
00078     virtual ~QicsDataModelDefault();
00079 
00080     virtual const QicsDataItem *item(int, int) const;
00081     virtual QicsDataModelRow rowItems(int, int, int) const;
00082     virtual QicsDataModelColumn columnItems(int, int, int) const;
00083 
00084     virtual void setColumnItems(int, const QicsDataModelColumn &v);
00085     virtual void setRowItems(int, const QicsDataModelRow &v);
00086 
00094     static QicsDataModel *create(int num_rows = 0 , int num_cols = 0);
00095 
00096 public slots:
00097 #if !defined(__GNUC__) || (__GNUC__ >= 3)
00098     // need this or else setItem() hides other setItem methods in superclass
00099     using QicsDataModel::setItem;
00100 #endif
00101 
00102     virtual void setItem(int row, int col, const QicsDataItem &item);
00103 
00104     virtual void insertColumns(int, int);
00105     virtual void insertRows(int, int);
00106     virtual void addColumns(int cols);
00107     virtual void addRows(int rows);
00108         
00109     virtual void clearItem (int, int);
00110     virtual void clearModel(void);
00111     virtual void deleteRow (int);
00112     virtual void deleteColumn (int);
00113     virtual void deleteRows(int num_rows, int start_row);
00114     virtual void deleteColumns(int num_cols, int start_col);
00115     
00116 protected:
00117     
00123     virtual void clearRow(int rownum);
00124     
00129     QicsDataItemPVPV myVectorOfRowPointers; 
00130 };
